    <mr-app loginurl="https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https%3A%2F%2Fuc.appengine.google.com%2F_ah%2Fconflogin%3Fcontinue%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fbugs.chromium.org%252Fp%252Fchromium%252Fissues%252Fdetail%253Fid%253D1285601%2526q%253Dlabel%25253Aexternal_security_report%2526can%253D1%2526start%253D3200" logouturl="https://bugs.chromium.org/_ah/logout?continue=https://accounts.google.com/Logout%3Fcontinue%3Dhttps://uc.appengine.google.com/_ah/logout%253Fcontinue%253Dhttps://www.google.com/url%25253Fsa%25253DD%252526q%25253Dhttps://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail%2525253Fid%2525253D1285601%25252526q%2525253Dlabel%252525253Aexternal_security_report%25252526can%2525253D1%25252526start%2525253D3200%252526ust%25253D1703407693916750%252526usg%25253DAOvVaw0yO8E6Kz5ZcWWCAWvKAzT-%26service%3Dah" versionbase="https://61906-5c6a57f-dot-monorail-prod.appspot.com" projectalert=""><!---->
      <style>
        
  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
    color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */
          --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
          --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
          --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
          font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
          color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
        }
        main {
          border-top: var(--chops-normal-border);
        }
        .snackbar-container {
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 1em;
          left: 1em;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
          z-index: 1000;
        }
        /** Unfix <chops-snackbar> to allow stacking. */
        chops-snackbar {
          position: static;
          margin-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .project-alert {
          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;
          font-weight: bold;
          text-align: center;
        }
      </style>

        mr-issue-page {

  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
    color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:

    <mr-cue centered="" cueprefname="search_for_numbers" hidden=""></mr-cue>
      
          
      
        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }
      <style>
        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }
      </style>
      
      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>

        <div class="dialog-content">

      </dialog>
    
        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>

          </chops-button>

      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

            Issue 1285601: Security: heap-use-after-use in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL
          <h1>
            
            Issue 1285601: Security: heap-use-after-use in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL
          </h1>
          
            Reported by
            
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      schedule<i id="availability-icon" class="material-icons inline-icon ${user.last_visit_timestamp ? '': 'inline-icon-unseen'}" title="undefined" hidden="">schedule</i>
      yuanv...@gmail.com<a id="user-link" href="/u/451807895" title="yuanv...@gmail.com"><!---->yuanv...@gmail.com<!----></a>
      yuanv...@gmail.com<span id="user-text" hidden=""><!---->yuanv...@gmail.com<!----></span>
      <div id="availability-text" class="availability-notice" title="undefined" hidden=""><!----><!----></div>
    <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on 
      Sat, Jan 8, 2022, 11:11 AM EST
    <chops-timestamp title="Sat, Jan 8, 2022, 11:11 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>
            
          <small class="byline">
            Reported by
            <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on <chops-timestamp title="Sat, Jan 8, 2022, 11:11 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>
            
          </small>
        <div class="main-text">
          <h1>
            
            Issue 1285601: Security: heap-use-after-use in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL
          </h1>
          <small class="byline">
            Reported by
            <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on <chops-timestamp title="Sat, Jan 8, 2022, 11:11 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>
            
          </small>
        </div>
      <div class="main-text-outer">
        <div class="main-text">
          <h1>
            
            Issue 1285601: Security: heap-use-after-use in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL
          </h1>
          <small class="byline">
            Reported by
            <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on <chops-timestamp title="Sat, Jan 8, 2022, 11:11 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>
            
          </small>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>If we login a user and visit a url match cart rules, CartService will be created for the profile. When CartService construct, |cart_db_| initializing and so is the ProfileProtoDB instance |cart_db_->proto_db_|. The initialization of ProfileProtoDB is an async task run on background thread and will post ProfileProtoDB::OnDatabaseInitialized task to UI thread when it finished. Before ProfileProtoDB initialized, all queries to it will be stored in |deferred_operations_| and deferred running in OnDatabaseInitialized. <span class="line"><!---->If we login a user and visit a url match cart rules, CartService will be created for the profile. When CartService construct, |cart_db_| initializing and so is the ProfileProtoDB instance |cart_db_-&gt;proto_db_|. The initialization of ProfileProtoDB is an async task run on background thread and will post ProfileProtoDB::OnDatabaseInitialized task to UI thread when it finished. Before ProfileProtoDB initialized, all queries to it will be stored in |deferred_operations_| and deferred running in OnDatabaseInitialized. <!----></span><br><br>DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt has a callchain like |CartService::GetDiscountURL => CartService::LoadCart => CartDB::LoadCart => ProfileProtoDB<T>::LoadOneEntry|, if this happened before |cart_db_| initialized, callback binds with raw WebContents pointer will be stored. The WebContents could be destoryed before the callback run, UaF triggered in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL.<span class="line"><!---->DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt has a callchain like |CartService::GetDiscountURL =&gt; CartService::LoadCart =&gt; CartDB::LoadCart =&gt; ProfileProtoDB&lt;T&gt;::LoadOneEntry|, if this happened before |cart_db_| initialized, callback binds with raw WebContents pointer will be stored. The WebContents could be destoryed before the callback run, UaF triggered in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL.<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383<!----></a><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393<!----></a><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41<!----></a><br>void DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt(content::WebContents* contents,<span class="line"><!---->void DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt(content::WebContents* contents,<!----></span><br>                                     int index,<span class="line"><!---->                                     int index,<!----></span><br>                                     TabChangeType change_type) {<span class="line"><!---->                                     TabChangeType change_type) {<!----></span><br>  ...<span class="line"><!---->  ...<!----></span><br>    if (last_interacted_url_ == contents->GetVisibleURL()) {<span class="line"><!---->    if (last_interacted_url_ == contents-&gt;GetVisibleURL()) {<!----></span><br>      cart_service_->GetDiscountURL(<span class="line"><!---->      cart_service_-&gt;GetDiscountURL(<!----></span><br>          contents->GetVisibleURL(),<span class="line"><!---->          contents-&gt;GetVisibleURL(),<!----></span><br>          base::BindOnce(&DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL,<span class="line"><!---->          base::BindOnce(&amp;DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL,<!----></span><br>                         weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), contents));          // callback bind with raw WebContents ptr<span class="line"><!---->                         weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), contents));          // callback bind with raw WebContents ptr<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>   ...<span class="line"><!---->   ...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180<!----></a><br>void ProfileProtoDB<T>::LoadOneEntry(const std::string& key,<span class="line"><!---->void ProfileProtoDB&lt;T&gt;::LoadOneEntry(const std::string&amp; key,<!----></span><br>                                     LoadCallback callback) {<span class="line"><!---->                                     LoadCallback callback) {<!----></span><br>  if (InitStatusUnknown()) {                        // if db is still initializing, callback be stored in |deferred_operations_|<span class="line"><!---->  if (InitStatusUnknown()) {                        // if db is still initializing, callback be stored in |deferred_operations_|<!----></span><br>    deferred_operations_.push_back(base::BindOnce(<span class="line"><!---->    deferred_operations_.push_back(base::BindOnce(<!----></span><br>        &ProfileProtoDB::LoadOneEntry, weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), key,<span class="line"><!---->        &amp;ProfileProtoDB::LoadOneEntry, weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), key,<!----></span><br>        std::move(callback)));<span class="line"><!---->        std::move(callback)));<!----></span><br>  } else if (FailedToInit()) {<span class="line"><!---->  } else if (FailedToInit()) {<!----></span><br>  ...<span class="line"><!---->  ...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=57<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=57"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=57<!----></a><br>void DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL(content::WebContents* contents,<span class="line"><!---->void DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL(content::WebContents* contents,<!----></span><br>                                              const GURL& discount_url) {<span class="line"><!---->                                              const GURL&amp; discount_url) {<!----></span><br>  contents->GetController().LoadURL(discount_url, content::Referrer(),      // raw WebContents ptr use here may trigger UaF<span class="line"><!---->  contents-&gt;GetController().LoadURL(discount_url, content::Referrer(),      // raw WebContents ptr use here may trigger UaF<!----></span><br>                                    ui::PAGE_TRANSITION_FIRST, std::string());<span class="line"><!---->                                    ui::PAGE_TRANSITION_FIRST, std::string());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>Fix suggestions:<span class="line"><!---->Fix suggestions:<!----></span><br>1. use weakptr or observe the webcontents<span class="line"><!---->1. use weakptr or observe the webcontents<!----></span><br>2. dynamic get webcontents in callback again<span class="line"><!---->2. dynamic get webcontents in callback again<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable (according to source code)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable (according to source code)<!----></span><br>Operating System: except Android (CartServcie not work on android)<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: except Android (CartServcie not work on android)<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>I am not familiar with cart module and still investigating it. The steps below is analysed from source code.<span class="line"><!---->I am not familiar with cart module and still investigating it. The steps below is analysed from source code.<!----></span><br><br>1. Enable cart and discount features in chrome and login a user. (I am still confused about these cart and discount rules)<span class="line"><!---->1. Enable cart and discount features in chrome and login a user. (I am still confused about these cart and discount rules)<!----></span><br>2. Prepare a large profile database or try slowly IO.  (lengthen cart database initialize time)<span class="line"><!---->2. Prepare a large profile database or try slowly IO.  (lengthen cart database initialize time)<!----></span><br>3. Visit a ruled url like '<span class="line"><!---->3. Visit a ruled url like '<!----></span>https://www.nike.com/cart<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.nike.com/cart"><!---->https://www.nike.com/cart<!----></a>'<span class="line"><!---->'<!----></span>  (contruct CartService)<span class="line"><!---->  (contruct CartService)<!----></span><br>4. Trigger CartService::PrepareForNavigation through action or Mojo call  (construct DiscountURLLoader instance in CartService and set |last_interacted_url_|)<span class="line"><!---->4. Trigger CartService::PrepareForNavigation through action or Mojo call  (construct DiscountURLLoader instance in CartService and set |last_interacted_url_|)<!----></span><br>5. Refresh tab (trigger DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt with TabChangeType::kAll) and close it. (destory the WebContents,)<span class="line"><!---->5. Refresh tab (trigger DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt with TabChangeType::kAll) and close it. (destory the WebContents,)<!----></span><br>6. UaF may trigger soon. (cart database initialized and run callbacks)<span class="line"><!---->6. UaF may trigger soon. (cart database initialized and run callbacks)<!----></span><br><br>Even there are lots of limits to trigger the bug, the race condition problem may could be triggerred by Mojo and lead to sandbox escape.<span class="line"><!---->Even there are lots of limits to trigger the bug, the race condition problem may could be triggerred by Mojo and lead to sandbox escape.<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Wei Yuan(@vo_sec) of MoyunSec VLab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Wei Yuan(@vo_sec) of MoyunSec VLab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        by

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

            <div>
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              <mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      <div class="chops-autocomplete-container">
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    <!----></mr-autocomplete>
            </div>

       Note: Avoiding 2-way data binding to futureproof this code
        for LitElement. 
      <input id="checkbox" type="checkbox">
      
        <slot></slot>

        <slot></slot>
      </label>

        mr-issue-page {

        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {

          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>
      <mr-description></mr-description>
      <mr-comment-list headinglevel="2"></mr-comment-list>

  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
    color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */
          --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
          --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
          --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
          font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
          color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
        }
        main {
          border-top: var(--chops-normal-border);
        }
        .snackbar-container {
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 1em;
          left: 1em;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
          z-index: 1000;
        }
        /** Unfix <chops-snackbar> to allow stacking. */
        chops-snackbar {
          position: static;
          margin-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .project-alert {
          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;
          font-weight: bold;
          text-align: center;
        }

                  <!---->

                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->reply to current issue<!----></span>
              <!---->
                <span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->Ctrl+Enter<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator"> / </span>
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->⌘+Enter<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->save issue reply (submit issue on issue filing page)<!----></span>
              <!---->
            </div>
          <!---->
            <div class="keyboard-help-section">
              <span></span><span class="help-title"><!---->Anywhere<!----></span>
              <!---->
                <span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->/<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->focus on the issue search field<!----></span>
              <!---->
                <span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->c<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->compose a new issue<!----></span>
              <!---->
                <span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->s<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->star the current issue<!----></span>
              <!---->
                <span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->?<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>
                <span class="key-tip"><!---->show this help dialog<!----></span>
              <!---->
            </div>
          <!---->
        </div>
        
          Note: Only signed in users can star issues or add comments, and
          only project members can select issues for bulk edits.
        <p>
          Note: Only signed in users can star issues or add comments, and
          only project members can select issues for bulk edits.
        </p>

      <form>

        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>

      yuanv...@gmail.com<span id="user-text" hidden=""><!---->yuanv...@gmail.com<!----></span>

        Description #1 by yuanv...@gmail.com (Jan 8, 2022)
      <option value="0" selected="">
        Description #1 by yuanv...@gmail.com (Jan 8, 2022)
      </option>
    
        <select aria-label="Description history menu" hidden="">

      <div class="select-container">
        <select aria-label="Description history menu" hidden="">
          <!---->
      <option value="0" selected="">
        Description #1 by yuanv...@gmail.com (Jan 8, 2022)
      </option>
    <!---->
        </select>
      </div>
      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>If we login a user and visit a url match cart rules, CartService will be created for the profile. When CartService construct, |cart_db_| initializing and so is the ProfileProtoDB instance |cart_db_->proto_db_|. The initialization of ProfileProtoDB is an async task run on background thread and will post ProfileProtoDB::OnDatabaseInitialized task to UI thread when it finished. Before ProfileProtoDB initialized, all queries to it will be stored in |deferred_operations_| and deferred running in OnDatabaseInitialized. <span class="line"><!---->If we login a user and visit a url match cart rules, CartService will be created for the profile. When CartService construct, |cart_db_| initializing and so is the ProfileProtoDB instance |cart_db_-&gt;proto_db_|. The initialization of ProfileProtoDB is an async task run on background thread and will post ProfileProtoDB::OnDatabaseInitialized task to UI thread when it finished. Before ProfileProtoDB initialized, all queries to it will be stored in |deferred_operations_| and deferred running in OnDatabaseInitialized. <!----></span><br><br>DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt has a callchain like |CartService::GetDiscountURL => CartService::LoadCart => CartDB::LoadCart => ProfileProtoDB<T>::LoadOneEntry|, if this happened before |cart_db_| initialized, callback binds with raw WebContents pointer will be stored. The WebContents could be destoryed before the callback run, UaF triggered in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL.<span class="line"><!---->DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt has a callchain like |CartService::GetDiscountURL =&gt; CartService::LoadCart =&gt; CartDB::LoadCart =&gt; ProfileProtoDB&lt;T&gt;::LoadOneEntry|, if this happened before |cart_db_| initialized, callback binds with raw WebContents pointer will be stored. The WebContents could be destoryed before the callback run, UaF triggered in DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL.<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=383<!----></a><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=393<!----></a><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/cart/discount_url_loader.cc;l=41<!----></a><br>void DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt(content::WebContents* contents,<span class="line"><!---->void DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt(content::WebContents* contents,<!----></span><br>                                     int index,<span class="line"><!---->                                     int index,<!----></span><br>                                     TabChangeType change_type) {<span class="line"><!---->                                     TabChangeType change_type) {<!----></span><br>  ...<span class="line"><!---->  ...<!----></span><br>    if (last_interacted_url_ == contents->GetVisibleURL()) {<span class="line"><!---->    if (last_interacted_url_ == contents-&gt;GetVisibleURL()) {<!----></span><br>      cart_service_->GetDiscountURL(<span class="line"><!---->      cart_service_-&gt;GetDiscountURL(<!----></span><br>          contents->GetVisibleURL(),<span class="line"><!---->          contents-&gt;GetVisibleURL(),<!----></span><br>          base::BindOnce(&DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL,<span class="line"><!---->          base::BindOnce(&amp;DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL,<!----></span><br>                         weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), contents));          // callback bind with raw WebContents ptr<span class="line"><!---->                         weak_ptr_factory_.GetWeakPtr(), contents));          // callback bind with raw WebContents ptr<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>   ...<span class="line"><!---->   ...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/persisted_state_db/profile_proto_db.h;drc=ce55a875516951f56c738b4527eb17ec9de7b6b1;l=180<!----></a><br>void ProfileProtoDB<T>::LoadOneEntry(const std::string& key,<span class="line"><!---->void ProfileProtoDB&lt;T&gt;::LoadOneEntry(const std::string&amp; key,<!----></span><br>                                     LoadCallback callback) {<span class="line"><!---->                                     LoadCallback callback) {<!----></span><br>  if (InitStatusUnknown()) {                        // if db is DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL(content::WebContents* contents,<span class="line"><!---->void DiscountURLLoader::NavigateToDiscountURL(content::WebContents* contents,<!----></span><br>                                              const GURL& discount_url) {<span class="line"><!---->                                              const GURL&amp; discount_url) {<!----></span><br>                               ui::PAGE_TRANSITION_FIRST, std::string());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>Fix suggestions:<span class="line"><!---->Fix suggestions:<!----></span><br>1. use weakptr or observe the webcontents<span class="line"><!---->1. use weakptr or observe the webcontents<!----></span><br>2. dynamic get webcontents in callback again<span class="line"><!---->2. dynamic get webcontents in callback again<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable (according to source code)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable (according to source code)<!----></span><br>Operating System: except Android (CartServcie not work on android)<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: except Android (CartServcie not work on android)<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>I am not familiar with cart module and still investigating it. The steps below is analysed from source code.<span class="line"><!---->I am not familiar with cart module and still investigating it. The steps below is analysed from source code.<!----></span><br><br>1. Enable cart and discount features in chrome and login a user. (I am still confused about these cart and discount rules)<span class="line"><!---->1. Enable cart and discount features in chrome and login a user. (I am still confused about these cart and discount rules)<!----></span><br>2. Prepare a large profile database or try slowly IO.  (lengthen cart database initialize time)<span class="line"><!---->2. Prepare a large profile database or try slowly IO.  (lengthen cart database initialize time)<!----></span><br>3. Visit a ruled url like '<span class="line"><!---->3. Visit a ruled url like '<!----></span>https://www.nike.com/cart<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.nike.com/cart"><!---->https://www.nike.com/cart<!----></a>'<span class="line"><!---->'<!----></span>  (contruct CartService)<span class="line"><!---->  (contruct CartService)<!----></span><br>4. Trigger CartService::PrepareForNavigation through action or Mojo call  (construct DiscountURLLoader instance in CartService and set |last_interacted_url_|)<span class="line"><!---->4. Trigger CartService::PrepareForNavigation through action or Mojo call  (construct DiscountURLLoader instance in CartService and set |last_interacted_url_|)<!----></span><br>5. Refresh tab (trigger DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt with TabChangeType::kAll) and close it. (destory the WebContents,)<span class="line"><!---->5. Refresh tab (trigger DiscountURLLoader::TabChangedAt with TabChangeType::kAll) and close it. (destory the WebContents,)<!----></span><br>6. UaF may trigger soon. (cart database initialized and run callbacks)<span class="line"><!---->6. UaF may trigger soon. (cart database initialized and run callbacks)<!----></span><br><br>Even there are lots of limits to trigger the bug, the race condition problem may could be triggerred by Mojo and lead to sandbox escape.<span class="line"><!---->Even there are lots of limits to trigger the bug, the race condition problem may could be triggerred by Mojo and lead to sandbox escape.<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Wei Yuan(@vo_sec) of MoyunSec VLab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Wei Yuan(@vo_sec) of MoyunSec VLab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

        mr-issue-page {

        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;

          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;

        mr-edit-issue {
          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>

        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>

        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>

          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>
